ygData.subject: Re: Poisen
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry if you find that hard to believe but it is true.  The snake conned red to me and the only reason I fought it was because it was already down in hit
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry if you find that hard to believe but it is true. The snake conned
red to me and the only reason I fought it was because it was already
down in hit points and had just killed someone else. By the time I
had finished it off, I had 208 hp left. I sat and watched as it slowly
dwindled away to nothing. I lost 120 hp to an Asp with my level
7 Barbarian warrior, too. Maybe you just got lucky, or maybe the
two snakes I fought were just a higher level...that does happen.

> ----------
> From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 2:08 PM
> To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Poisen
>
> From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
>
> you lost 200 Hp from a darkweed? I find that really hard to belive,
> everytime i fight one no matter what the level i am i lose about 70
> Hp...certainly not 200 i find that ridiculos.
> John Zwanenburg
> Tips Support/Support Sipt
> Tel: (613) 998-2745
>
> > ----------
> > From: Jones, Brian[SMTP:brian.jones@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 3:03 PM
> > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Poisen
> >
> > From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> > Rattlesnakes bite with weak poison so you shouldn't have a
> > problem with these. Asps and Darkweed snakes are a
> > different matter all together. They have a higher poison and if
> > you get down in hit points while poisoned, you will probably
> > die before the time the poison wears off. I suggest not to
> > fight the Asps and Darkweed snakes unless there is a
> > cleric available to heal you. The poison from the darkweed
> > snake took my ogre from 200 hp to death before it wore off at
> > level 8.
> >
> > Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
> > "Periissem ni periisem"
> >
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Kyle Mobley[SMTP:kyle@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 5:52 AM
> > > To: 'Warriors List'
> > > Subject: [warriors_eq] Poisen
> > >
> > > From: Kyle Mobley <kyle@...>
> > >
> > > Does anyone know if there is an item out there that will raise your
> > > ability to resist poisen... I am a loley lvl 11 Warrior and it seems
> > > that I take the worst damage from creatures that can poisen like
> > > Rattlesnakes and Asps... any advice would be great...
> > >
> > >
> > > Nelix
> > >
